summary:
Most mining and smithing materials reduced in weight.

Pickaxe -75% to 2.5
Leather -50% to 1.0
Ores -40% to 0.6
Ingots -50% to 0.5
Dragon Bones and Scales -30% to 10 and 7
Some heavier Dwemer scrap reduced
Woodcutter\'s Axe reduced also by request

NOTE: Apparently this can cause localization issues?, so if anyone would like to help make
descriptionHtml:
Most mining and smithing materials reduced in weight.

Pickaxe -75% to 2.5
Leather -50% to 1.0
Ores -40% to 0.6
Ingots -50% to 0.5
Dragon Bones and Scales -30% to 10 and 7
Some heavier Dwemer scrap reduced
Woodcutter\'s Axe reduced also by request

NOTE: Apparently this can cause localization issues?, so if anyone would like to help make their localization let me know!

Also Available on Steam Workshop: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=7460
author: Jynnent_Onyx
